channel.title: Linux on 思•祎委
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on 思•祎委

item.title: 命令集
item.description: 上传文件至服务器 scp -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa_gcp -r ~/Downloads/kyrie2-top-nginx-1103105800/\*.kyrie2.top_chain.crt lbwstco@0.0.0.0: 查看文件占用 du -h --max-depth=1 查看内存占用 ps auxw|head -1;ps auxw|sort -rn -k4|head -10 删除群晖生成的文件 find / -regex '@SynoEASstream$' -and -t f --delete 查找并移动文件 find ~/Downloads/ -maxdepth 1 -type f -print0 | xargs -0 mv -t ~/Videos NUC8i5BEH 去除菜单栏网口图标 fn=".`date +%s`" && sudo mv /System/Library/CoreServices/Menu\ Extras/ExpressCard.menu /System/Library/CoreServices/Menu\ Extras/ExpressCard.menu$fn && sudo touch /System/Library/CoreServices/Menu\ Extras/ExpressCard.menu 修改地区为台湾 显示旗帜 sudo defaults write /Library/Preferences/.GlobalPreferences.plist Country -string "TW" 查看端口占用 lsof -i tcp:8080 重启队列 supervisorctl -c worker.
